name: Guitar Trio
description:
Rock out with your hands out!! How cool are these? Just imagine how cute these would be standing up in a music themed bathroom or game room!! They make awesome party favors, graduation, music or birthday gifts for all ages!! All 3 soaps come packed in a rectangle box with silver string paper and a bow. Each guitar measures 6”x 2” and weighs 1 oz.

These are scented with “Butt Naked” but don’t let the name fool you!! The scent has a tantalizing base note medley of granny smith apples and honeydew melon, middle notes of strawberries and pears, with hints of spice. Defiantly a yummy smelling soap!!


***These guitars can be any color you would like just add a note during check out.

***Custom orders are always welcome and wholesale information is available upon request.
*** We do offer discounts on large orders

Ingrediants: Clear soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sorbital, Coconut Oil, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Soap Colorant, Fragrance

name: Girls Night Soap
description:
If there are 2 things a girl can not live with out it would be her heels and lipstick!! To even sweeten the deal these fancy goat milk soaps smell just like Cabernet Sauvignon Wine!! What great favors for bridesmaids, bachelorette party, office party, or even a SATC movie party!! These can be customized to fit your color scheme!

Custom orders are always welcome and wholesale information is available upon request.

If you prefer non goats milk or have any other question please let us know.

Each shoe measures 4" and weighs in at 1 oz
Lipstick measures 3" and weighs in at 1 oz.

High Heel Ingredients:
Goat's Milk Soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coconut oil, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Goat's Milk, Titanium Dioxide, DMDM Hydantoin, Soap Colorant, Fragrance

Lipstick Ingredients:
Clear soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sorbital, Coconut Oil, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Soap Colorant, Fragrance

name: Dude Where's My Teeth?
description:
This cute little denture set is sure to bring a laugh to the room!! Thank your dentist next time you see him and bring him a set!! These make great gag gifts or for someone who is celebrating an “Over the Hill” party!! Scented with sweet Lemon Sugar these cute soaps measure 2”x2” and weigh a total of 3 oz. Your teeth to go will come packaged in a cute black take out box with crinkle paper.

Perfect for gift giving or party favors!

***Custom orders are always welcome and wholesale information is available upon request.
*** We do offer discounts on large orders


Ingredients:
White soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coconut Oil, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Titanium Dioxide, Soap Colorant, Fragrance

name: My Poo Smells Like Roses Soap
description:
Ever been asked "So you think your ____ dont stink?" Now you can simply reply "No, mine smells like roses!" This is the perfect gag gift for those with a great sense of humor!! This little pile of poo smells like roses and is sure to bring a laugh even to those who feel a little dumpy!! Soap comes packaged in a clear celo bag with green crinkle paper and pink bow. Total weight is 4 oz and measures 4" wide and 2" tall.



Ingredients:
Clear soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sorbital, Coconut Oil, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Soap Colorant, Fragrance

name: A Pirates Life Soap
description:
Get ready to walk the plank and scream AARRGG!! These glow in the dark pirates skulls will make even the dirtiest of pirates want to wash there hands!!

Black Crows Pirate Soap is about 4oz. of regular soap made to smell just like an ocean breeze. These measure at 4" x 4". Your pirate will arrive packaged in a celo bag with a yellow or black bow.

These would make the cutest party favors for your pirate party or even a pirate movie premier!

***Custom orders are always welcome and wholesale information is available upon request.



Ingredients:
White soap base: Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coconut Oil, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Myristate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Cocoate, Purified Water, Titanium Dioxide, soap colorant, fragrance

Glow in The Dark Colorant Ingredients: Glycerin, Synthetic Organic Pigment Mixture
